ABOUT.TITLE: LEADERS IN IMPORTATION
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Founded in San Luis Potos√≠, Importadora Euro has established itself as the national benchmark in the importation and distribution of motorcycle tires. Our strategic alliance with leading brands allows us to offer world-class products.
ABOUT.FEATURE_1_DESC: Of experience in the Mexican market
ABOUT.FEATURE_2_DESC: Efficient logistics to the entire country

WHY.TITLE: WHY IMPORTADORA EURO?
WHY.DESCRIPTION: We differentiate ourselves in the market by offering more than just quality products. We are the strategic partner your business needs to grow.
WHY.CARD_1_DESC: No intermediaries, we work directly with manufacturers. This translates to better prices and greater inventory availability for you.
WHY.CARD_2_DESC: We optimize costs to offer you the best profit margins in the national market.
WHY.CARD_3_DESC: Large inventory available for immediate delivery. Forget about shortages.
WHY.CARD_4_DESC: Secure and fast shipping to any part of the Mexican Republic.
WHY.CARD_5_DESC: Specialized team ready to guide you in the ideal selection for your market.
WHY.CARD_6_DESC: Direct support on all our products. Your investment is safe with us.

BRANDS.TITLE: OUR BRANDS
BRANDS.PRAXIS_DESC: Indian engineering product with almost 10 years of experience. International quality at affordable prices, perfect for the Mexican market.

PRAXIS_HERO.SUBTITLE: Tires designed with Global Technology to offer maximum grip and durability in every kilometer.

SERVICES.TITLE: MORE THAN IMPORTATION
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: We offer a comprehensive service that goes beyond simple tire sales. We are your strategic partner in the motorcycle business.
SERVICES.SERVICE_1_DESC: Complete coverage throughout the Mexican Republic with fast and secure shipping. Optimized logistics network guaranteeing punctual deliveries to any point in the country.
SERVICES.SERVICE_2_DESC: Direct importation allowing us to offer the best market prices without intermediaries. Special discounts for distributors and wholesalers.
SERVICES.SERVICE_3_DESC: Specialized team helping you select the perfect tires for every motorcycle type and need. Constant product training.
SERVICES.SERVICE_4_DESC: All our tires come with official manufacturer warranty. 100% original products with international quality certifications.

COVERAGE.TITLE: WE DELIVER ALL OVER MEXICO
COVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Distribution network covering the entire Mexican Republic with guaranteed delivery times
COVERAGE.MAP_SUBTITLE_2: Guaranteed deliveries in the 32 states of the Republic
COVERAGE.ZONE_CENTER_STATES: San Luis Potos√≠, Quer√©taro, Guanajuato, Aguascalientes, Zacatecas
COVERAGE.ZONE_SOUTH_STATES: CDMX, Puebla, Veracruz, Oaxaca, Chiapas, M√©rida, Canc√∫n

CLIENTS.TITLE: THEY TRUST US
CLIENTS.DESCRIPTION: Distributors, workshops, and businesses across the Mexican Republic that have grown with us

FAQ.TITLE: HAVE QUESTIONS?
FAQ.DESCRIPTION: Answers to the most common questions from our distributors
FAQ.A1: We have no minimum order. You can order from 1 tire to the volume you need. However, we offer progressive volume discounts that make purchasing larger quantities more attractive.
FAQ.Q2: What payment forms do you accept?
FAQ.A2: We accept bank transfers, cash deposits, and card payments. For frequent customers, we offer a credit line with preferential terms based on purchase history.
FAQ.A3: Shipping is FREE on purchases over $3,000 MXN. For smaller orders, shipping cost varies by delivery zone (from $150 to $350 MXN).
FAQ.A4: Central zone: 24-48 hours. Rest of the country: 2-6 business days depending on location. All shipments include a tracking number for real-time tracking.
FAQ.A5: Yes, we have a tiered pricing structure. The larger your purchase volume, the better prices you get. Contact us to see the current discount table.
FAQ.Q6: How do I become a distributor?
FAQ.A6: It's very simple: just contact us and our sales team will register you in the system. No registration fees or complicated requirements. Start buying from your first order!
FAQ.Q7: Do the tires have a warranty?
FAQ.A7: Absolutely. All our tires come with a 5-year factory warranty against manufacturing defects from the production date.
FAQ.A8: We specialize as exclusive Praxis distributors, but we can source other brands upon special request.
FAQ.Q9: Do you ship to extended zones?
FAQ.A9: Yes, we cover the entire national territory. For extended zones (remote locations), an extra cost or additional delivery time might apply, which is notified before confirming your order.
FAQ.Q10: Can I pick up my order personally?
FAQ.A10: Yes, we have a warehouse in San Luis Potos√≠. If you are in the area, you can pick up your order directly and save on shipping time.

HERO.TITLE:

HERO.SUBTITLE: Experience maximum grip, durability, and safety in every kilometer. Leading brand with almost 10 years of experience in high-quality automotive products.

FEATURES.TITLE: WHY CHOOSE PRAXIS?
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: State-of-the-art German technology designed to offer maximum performance in all driving conditions.
FEATURES.CARD_1_DESC: Extended warranty backing the exceptional quality of every Praxis tire. Safe and reliable driving in all conditions.
FEATURES.CARD_2_DESC: Asymmetric tread design optimized for maximum cornering stability and instant response at high speeds.
FEATURES.CARD_3_DESC: Reinforced construction and high-durability rubber compound maximizing lifespan, offering the market's best mileage.
FEATURES.CARD_4_DESC: Optimized design minimizing vibrations and rolling noise, providing an ultra-quiet and comfortable ride.
FEATURES.CARD_5_DESC: Low rolling resistance reducing fuel consumption, saving money and reducing CO2 emissions.
FEATURES.CARD_6_DESC: Large circumferential grooves efficiently evacuating water during bad weather, ensuring excellent grip.

TECH.TITLE: PRAXIS TECHNOLOGY AND EXPERIENCE
TECH.DESCRIPTION: Every Praxis tire incorporates almost 10 years of experience and leadership in supplying automotive products. Our team of highly trained professionals guarantees exceptional quality and performance in every product.
TECH.LIST_1: Advanced rubber compound for superior grip in all conditions
TECH.LIST_2: Optimized tread design for maximum performance
TECH.LIST_3: Rigorous testing at ETDAC (Tire Development and Analysis Center)

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_1: "Incredible difference in handling. Praxis exceeded my expectations in grip and durability. I've driven 60,000 km and they still look new."
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_2: "The best investment for my vehicle. Low fuel consumption and excellent behavior in rain. The Importadora Euro team was very professional."
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_3: "As a professional driver, I need reliable tires. Praxis has given me that confidence. Excellent value for money and impeccable service."

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.SECTION1_TEXT: Welcome to the Importadora Euro website. By accessing and using this site, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
TERMS.SECTION2_TEXT: This site is intended for informational and commercial use related to our products. Misuse, unauthorized copying of content, or any activity that may damage the technological infrastructure is prohibited.
TERMS.SECTION3_TEXT: All content, including logos (Praxis, Importadora Euro), texts, graphics, and images, is the property of their respective owners and is protected by applicable intellectual property laws in Mexico.
TERMS.SECTION4_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after their publication on the website.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Notice
PRIVACY.SECTION1_TEXT: Importadora Euro, domiciled in San Luis Potos√≠, Mexico, is responsible for processing your personal data in accordance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties.
PRIVACY.SECTION2_TEXT: We may collect identification data such as: Full name, phone, email, and tax data for billing. This data is voluntarily provided by you through our forms.
PRIVACY.SECTION3_TEXT: Your information will be used to: Provide requested products, inform about changes to them, evaluate service quality, and perform billing and collection management.
PRIVACY.SECTION4_TEXT: You have the right to Access, Rectify, and Cancel your personal data, as well as to Oppose their processing. To exercise these rights, contact us at contacto@importadoraeuro.com.

CUSTOMERS.TITLE: [EN] Clientes

GMROI.DEF: Gross Margin Return On Inventory Investment. Checks if you're making money on what you stock.

INV_TURNOVER.DEF: How many times you sold and replaced your entire stock in a period.

ABC_ANALYSIS.DEF: Categorizing inventory by value. A=High Value (Keep secure), C=Low Value (Bulk).

DEAD_STOCK.DEF: Tires that haven't sold in 6-12 months. They tie up cash and space.

SELL_THROUGH.DEF: Percentage of stock sold vs received. High rate = Hot product.

CAGR.DEF: Compound Annual Growth Rate. Smooths out volatility to show steady growth trend.

STOCKOUT_RISK.DEF: Danger of running out of tires. Probability demand exceeds inventory.

CLV.DEF: Total profit expected from a single customer over time.

AOV.DEF: Average amount spent each time a customer buys.

CONVERSION_RATE.DEF: Percentage of visitors who actually buy tires.

EBITDA.DEF: Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization. Raw profitability.

SAFETY_STOCK.DEF: Extra tires kept just in case of delays or sales spikes.

LEAD_TIME.DEF: Time from placing an order with supplier to receiving tires.

PERFECT_ORDER.DEF: Orders shipped on time, complete, and undamaged.

CAC.DEF: Cost to convince a potential customer to buy.

CHURN_RATE.DEF: Percentage of customers who stop buying.

CART_ABANDONMENT.DEF: People who add tires to cart but don't checkout.

COHORT_ANALYSIS.DEF: Tracking groups of customers over time (e.g., 'May Buyers').

LTV_CAC.DEF: Relationship between customer value and cost to acquire. Aim for > 3:1.

EOQ.DEF: Ideal order size to minimize holding and ordering costs.

RFM.DEF: Recency, Frequency, Monetary value analysis of customers.

SLOTTING.DEF: Organizing warehouse for efficiency (Fast movers near doors).

CROSS_DOCKING.DEF: Unloading from supplier and loading to customer immediately (No storage).

PARETO.DEF: 80% of sales come from 20% of your products (The 'A' items).

CANNIBALIZATION.DEF: When a new product steals sales from your existing product.

LIBRARIES.TITLE: Stack Explorer
LIBRARIES.SUBTITLE: A holographic tour of the technologies powering this platform.

OVERVIEW.SUBTITLE: Manage your account, orders, and addresses.

PROFILE.TITLE: Profile & Invoicing

ADDRESS_BOOK.TITLE: Address Book
ADDRESS_BOOK.EMPTY_DESC: Add a shipping address to speed up checkout.

ORDERS.TITLE: My Orders
ORDERS.EMPTY_TITLE: You haven't placed any orders yet.

PRODUCT_TYPES.TITLE: Product Types
PRODUCT_TYPES.SUBTITLE: Manage product type templates and their specifications
PRODUCT_TYPES.SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: Built-in product types that cannot be deleted. You can only toggle their active status.
PRODUCT_TYPES.CUSTOM_DESCRIPTION: User-created product types. These can be fully edited and deleted.
PRODUCT_TYPES.CREATE_FIRST: Create your first custom product type to get started.

FORM.EDIT_SUBTITLE: Modify the template and specification schema
FORM.NEW_SUBTITLE: Create a custom product type with specifications
FORM.TEMPLATE_ID_HINT: Lowercase, alphanumeric, and underscores only. Cannot be changed after creation.
FORM.SPEC_DESCRIPTION: Define the fields that will appear in the product form for this type
FORM.TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION: Click a template to quickly add a common field type

EMPTY_STATE.TITLE: Let's build your product schema
EMPTY_STATE.DESCRIPTION: Add specification fields to define what information products of this type will have.
EMPTY_STATE.EXAMPLES: Examples of fields you might add:

FORM.DUPLICATE_WARNING: This key is already used in Field {{numbers}}

HELP.FIELD_KEY: Unique identifier for this field. Auto-generated but you can customize it.
HELP.TYPE: The type of input shown in the product form.
HELP.UNIT: Optional measurement unit shown next to value (e.g., mm, kg, L)
HELP.OPTIONS: For select fields, enter available options separated by commas
HELP.MIN_MAX: Minimum and maximum allowed values for number fields
HELP.REQUIRED: If checked, this field must be filled when creating a product
HELP.SEARCHABLE: If checked, this field is included in product search
HELP.FILTERABLE: If checked, this field appears as a filter option in the catalog
